document_data.name: Orstramagrus
document_data.mainbody: '''Orstramagrus''' was a merchant in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. He was a guest at the [[Open Feast]] of {{yearlink|1479}}.
document_data.Description: Orstramagus was fat, with chubby hands. At the [[Open Feast]], he wore velvets that quickly became wine-stained, and many rings on his hands. To [[Amarune Whitewave]], his voice was like braying.
document_data.Personality: During the Open feast, guests found the man coming across as a blowhard, and a smart-mouth. He had a taste for batter-fried prawns.
document_data.Abilities: Whether correct or not, he was quite the pedant for [[undead]] nomenclature.
document_data.Possessions: He wore many rings, and velvets, to the Open Feast.
document_data.History: Orstramagrus was a guest at the [[Open Feast]] in [[Mirtul 26]] of the {{yearlink|1479}} in [[Castle Obarskyr]], [[Suzail]]. He was quite insistent about the terminology of undead, and got in a jab at [[Kathkote Dawntard]], who took it in good cheer against everyone's expectations.
